One day, Tim saw a sad girl. She had lost her toy. Tim remembered the happy sun and the happy flower. He wanted to be nice, like them. So, he gave the sad girl one of his toys. The girl was very happy. Tim felt good too.

Please, Kitty, can you show me the path to my home?" Kitty agreed and they started walking together.
As they walked, Kitty kept being bossy and telling Mimi what to do. Mimi didn't like it, but she needed to find her way home. Finally, they reached Mimi's home. Mimi thanked Kitty and said, "Please try to be less bossy with others." Kitty thought about it and promised to try. From that day on, Kitty became a much nicer friend to everyone in the town.

Some birds were watching from the other side of the park, and they started to laugh.
